sentence: They responded by inserting a disgusting, corrupt provision into a  so-called clean spending bill that allows for a slush fund for eight  Republican Senators at the last hour to each collect as much as a  million dollars or more--one million taxpayer dollars each--because  their phone records were lawfully seized in connection with the January  6 insurrection.
